entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening with risk of thunderstorms. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 7:05 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
